author: Donald Hoskins <Grommish>
end_user_data_statement: This Cog does not store user data.
install_msg:
You must register your Virustotal API key with Redbot by using `[p]set api virustotal`

You will click the button and enter `api_key <yourapikey>`

Check that the API key is properly set with `[p]vt status`
name: Grommish-Cogs
